2010-07-24

30 Days of Buffy: Day 19 - Character You Like That Everyone Else Hates

Not being part of the Buffy fanatics world I tend to only know who "everyone else hates" thanks to Hazel. In her post she mentions Riley (who I don't really mind that much), Kennedy (who was a bit annoying) and Dawn... Dawn!? Dawn was great... or at least could have been great, except that after The Gift they didn't really know waht to do with her. And Michelle Trachtenberg was lovely so clearly if "everyone else hates" Dawn and I clearly don't then I guess that's Day 19 sorted...

Character I like that everyone else hates is Dawn...
